item.title: Tutorial on Google Script
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: class: center, middle, bg-info, text-light Tutorial on Google Script Cyrus Ngan Objectives - Mock Interview Workshop Create a google form Application for Mock Interview Workshop User can choose his / her name in a list User can apply at most .mark[5 courses] for the mock interview User should enter Course ID in JUPAS User should enter link of the course information 10 pages slide to complete the simple tutorial class: center middle bg-dark text-light
